result.markdown:
---
title: "Pythonを電卓として使う"
author: "Nobukuni Hyakutake"
date: "2023-01-27"
date-format: "iso"
categories: [Python]
image: "calc.jpeg"
---

## 足し算

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
1+1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1}
```
2
```
:::
:::


## 引き算

::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
8-5
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
3
```
:::
:::


## 掛け算

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
8*7
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
56
```
:::
:::


## 割り算

::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
12/6
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4}
```
2.0
```
:::
:::


## 割り算の剰余

::: {.cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
23%7
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
```
2
```
:::
:::


## 冪

::: {.cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
2**3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
```
8
```
:::
:::


## 三角関数

### sin

::: {.cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
np.sin(0.2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
0.19866933079506122
```
:::
:::


### cos

::: {.cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
np.cos(0.2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
0.9800665778412416
```
:::
:::


### tan

::: {.cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
np.tan(0.2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
```
0.20271003550867248
```
:::
:::


## Python version

::: {.cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import platform
"Python version "+platform.python_version()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10}
```
'Python version 3.10.7'
```
:::
:::
